strapiPost.title: Taste and See
strapiPost.content:
As one of the few bar and spirit tasting rooms in Northwest Arkansas, Lakepoint bar makes an experience out of finding the right drink.

  • Cocktail hour: Located on Loch Lomond in Bella Vista, The Tasting Room at Lakepoint is ideal for for an afternoon with a friend or a group of friends. Their wine and spirit collection is tough to surpass.
  • Bartender special: Each weekend, the team at Lakepoint picks a different theme of several wines and spirits, creating an experience out of learning about producers, regions, and varietals.

Discover the Tasting Room and all that Lakepoint has to offer HERE.
